properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 17 at 4:19PM EST until January 22 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Bibb...Houston...Jones...
Monroe and Twiggs Counties

Ocmulgee River near Hawkinsville affecting Bleckley and Pulaski
Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Johnson...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Ocmulgee River near Hawkinsville.
* From tomorrow late morning until late Tuesday night.
* At 345 PM Friday the stage was 17.1 feet, and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast to develop.
* Flood stage is 20 feet.
* The river is forecast to rise above flood stage by late Saturday
morning then continue rising, reaching near 21.5 feet by Sunday
afternoon. The river is forecast to fall below flood stage Tuesday
evening.
* At 17 feet, timberlands will begin to flood along the river.

At 19 feet, the river begins to cover Riverside Drive and cutoff
residents from their homes.

At 20 to 21 feet, minor flooding of roads begins on the south side
of Hawkinsville along Gooseneck Lane. With the flooding of Gooseneck
Lane, residents are cutoff from reaching their homes.
